title: Bug 6410File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File appears to be dirtied but not changed, and code assist does not appear.
OB: When using code assist, the file becomes dirtied without any actual changes being made, and as a result, the code assist feature does not appear.
SR:
1. Open the file in the IDE.
2. Trigger the code assist feature.
3. Verify that the file becomes dirtied without any actual changes being made.
4. Observe that the code assist feature does not appear.
